body: Even though this is obviously a machine translation, and default font typeset, kudo to the guy who put effort into it.

directly supporting the creator, i give this a 7.5/10 personally, art's great and as long as you can just fix the grammar in your head on your own it's really good, not even a fan of NTR but i still rate it quite high, have a great day
